last_episode_to_air.name: The Yellow Tide
last_episode_to_air.overview: Two old flames are reunited. Sole leaves on her own terms, while Zulema decides what Sandoval's ending will be. The inmates' fates are revealed.

name: Locked Up
overview: Set up to take the blame for corporate fraud, young Macarena Ferreiro is locked up in a high-security women's prison surrounded by tough, ruthless criminals in this tense, provocative Spanish thriller.

episodes.name: Dead Mosquito
episodes.overview: Unable to cope with prison life, Macarena is taken under the wing of her cellmate Yolanda. But a midnight visit from Zulema, the jail's self-appointed queen bee, is about to change her life for ever.

episodes.name: Sewing Tinkerbell
episodes.overview: Sole suffers a health crisis, and Macarena scrambles to find a way to warn her parents that they're in imminent danger.

episodes.name: Everything Happens for a Reason
episodes.overview: Macarena races against a deadline to pay back her growing debt to Anabel. The SIM card goes missing and changes hands multiple times.

episodes.name: A Day in the Country
episodes.overview: When Zulema and Anabel harass Valbuena, he pits the two against each other. Rizos gets an offer she can't refuse, even if it means betraying Macarena.

episodes.name: Harsh Reality
episodes.overview: As the scene in the woods plays out in flashbacks, Rizos learns she must get a job on the outside, and Zulema reveals a secret to Saray's family.

episodes.name: They'll Come for You
episodes.overview: Anabel forces Macarena to pick up more drugs for her via a conjugal visit with a stranger. Leopoldo and Roman track down the Egyptian's camper van.

episodes.name: 5 on the Dot
episodes.overview: Maca comes to realize she has proof of her relationship with Simon; their unborn son. But getting the fetus's DNA tested will be no easy task.

episodes.name: Pretty Woman
episodes.overview: Macarena's feelings of attraction to Rizos overwhelm her -- and confuse her. Leopoldo suffers a serious setback. Zulema attempts to escape.

episodes.name: Quid pro quo
episodes.overview: Zulema and Saray hold Macarena hostage in order to force the release of the Egyptian, but Leopoldo wants Hanbal to reveal where the money is first.

episodes.name: Gray Cat
episodes.overview: Macarena agrees to be Rizos's girlfriend. Sandoval tries to convince Miranda to send Macarena, who's having visions of a cat, to a psychiatric prison.

episodes.name: The Turtle Principle
episodes.overview: A donor heart becomes available for Sole. Zulema offers Leopoldo the Egyptian in exchange for 8 million euros. Macarena makes an untimely discovery.

episodes.name: Two Guns for One Monkey
episodes.overview: An accident scares Macarena into fleeing overseas with the other escapees. Fabio makes a decision about his marriage. Miranda picks a security chief.

episodes.name: Home Sweet Home
episodes.overview: Sandoval's wife gets a shock. Karim forces Zulema's lawyer to give him a lead on the Egyptian. Castillo's search of the Ferreiro home turns harrowing.

episodes.name: The Little Hen
episodes.overview: Castillo turns against Leopoldo and breaks his promises to help Macarena. The police are assigned a new case involving a missing teen girl.

episodes.name: A Body in the Trunk
episodes.overview: Macarena goes to great lengths to email Karim. Sole tracks down the family of the heart donor. Saray and Macarena learn what Valbuena did Rizos.

episodes.name: In the Line of Fire I
episodes.overview: Under the guise of a conjugal visit, Zulema shares a secret plan with Román that will benefit them both. In solitary, Saray falls prey to Sandoval.

episodes.name: The Baboons
episodes.overview: An undercover cop from Fabio's past and a suspect in the case of the missing teen enter the prison. Encarna brings the Egyptian's ashes to his mother.

episodes.name: A Field Day
episodes.overview: An outbreak of food poisoning prompts the inmates to launch a defiant protest. Macarena is granted a 24-hour leave, which takes a startling turn.

episodes.name: Life Goes On
episodes.overview: Susana tells Helena she had a daughter. Sandoval shares a suspicion with Miranda about her husband. Fernando surprises Sole with a request.

episodes.name: Getting Your Fingers Burned
episodes.overview: Macarena has doubts about her relationship with Rizos. Zulema has a new plan and asks Macarena for help. Macarena's brother is in Morocco searching the money. The police investigation continues.

episodes.name: Sins and Confusions
episodes.overview: Rizos proposes a sexy fundraiser for Macarena's legal defense. Palacios makes a confession to Fabio. Zulema goes to extremes to get out of solitary.

episodes.name: Patron of the Desperate
episodes.overview: Amaia's parents ask to see Zulema. When Rizos is jumped for taking over the drug trade, Macarena searches for a way to strip Anabel of her power.

episodes.name: Banana and Lemon
episodes.overview: Sole is scared off by the hope Fernando offers her. A judge hears Zulema's request for a deal. Fabio makes a change in plans that stuns Macarena.

episodes.name: Liquid
episodes.overview: Sole's big day arrives. Sandoval receives an offer. As time runs out, Macarena ruthlessly tries to force Zulema to reveal Amaia's location.

episodes.name: North Cross
episodes.overview: Due to overcrowding, Macarena and her friends -- and enemies -- are transferred to a new prison. Sole gets news about her husband that interests Anabel.

episodes.name: Very Easy or Very Difficult
episodes.overview: The Chinese gang gives Mercedes a mission. Fabio pays Macarena a visit. Altagracia executes an illicit plan to find out who killed her colleague.

episodes.name: One Grain of Rice
episodes.overview: Altagracia learns an upsetting truth about Unai. Saray receives shocking news from her mother. The Chinese gang spots Anabel stealing their drug trade.

episodes.name: The Flag on the Wall
episodes.overview: Zulema learns about the Chinese gang's escape plan and drug-smuggling method, and takes steps to hijack both. Sole seeks to avenge her husband's murder.

episodes.name: Someone Who Doesn't Give a Sh*t About You
episodes.overview: Mercedes's daughter goes missing. Altagracia's investigation of the cash found in Unai's locker puts a target on her back. Tere again faces temptation.

episodes.name: Six Months Is a Long Time
episodes.overview: A smuggling malfunction causes chaos in the henhouse. Mercedes learns who was actually behind her daughter's disappearance. Rojas shares her bad news.

episodes.name: We Were Girls
episodes.overview: Per an Easter tradition, a Cruz del Norte inmate is selected to be pardoned. With Altagracia's help, Zulema negotiates a deal with Hong Fang.

episodes.name: What We Know About Monsters
episodes.overview: Altagracia sets out to avenge Unai's murder. Zulema decides to fulfill her promise to Saray. Mercedes gets caught in a showdown between sibling rivals.

episodes.name: The Barbie
episodes.overview: A familiar face becomes Cruz del Norte's director, and an ex-jailer arrives as an inmate. Zulema does whatever it takes to avoid going back to prison.

episodes.name: The Escape
episodes.overview: An inmate dares to swipe the drugs left in the middle of the floor. Altagracia uses her knowledge of the prison's inner workings to devise an escape.

episodes.name: Threshold of Pain
episodes.overview: When Zulema refuses to reveal Altagracia's location, all the inmates receive the same punishment she gets. Sole gives Tere a grave responsibility.

episodes.name: Mum
episodes.overview: Goya immediately preys upon Fátima. Zulema and Altagracia try to force Sandoval's hand by targeting the person he cares about most: his ex-wife.

episodes.name: Betrayal
episodes.overview: An inmate says a difficult goodbye. The choir performs at a retirement home, where some of the singers use the opportunity to stock up on drugs.

episodes.name: Bad Person
episodes.overview: Sad news leads Tere to a happy reunion. Sandoval finally succeeds in awakening Zulema's maternal instinct and uses it as a weapon against her.

episodes.name: Back Home
episodes.overview: An inmate comes back from the brink of death. Sandoval sets out to complete his mission of revenge. Sole's exit strategy hits a snag.

episodes.name: The Yellow Tide
episodes.overview: Two old flames are reunited. Sole leaves on her own terms, while Zulema decides what Sandoval's ending will be. The inmates' fates are revealed.
